file_insights.changes: Added Pydantic schemas for reservation-related requests: ReservationCreateRequest, CheckAvailabilityRequest, CancelReservationRequest, PurchaseCreditsRequest

Added comprehensive Pydantic response schemas for reservations, including ReservationResponse, ListReservationsResponse, AvailabilityResponse, PricingEstimateResponse, CancelReservationResponse, ReservationCreditResponse, CreditBalanceResponse, ListCreditsResponse

patterns_discovered: Detailed Pydantic model design with rich field validation
Consistent use of Optional fields for flexible data representation
Class methods for model conversion (from_model pattern)
Comprehensive metadata and description fields for each schema attribute
gotchas_discovered: Complex datetime handling with ISO 8601 format
Multiple status tracking fields (is_active, is_upcoming, is_cancellable)
Potential complexity in converting between model and response objects
recommendations: Consider implementing JSON Schema validation for start/end times
Add unit tests for from_model class methods
Create comprehensive documentation for each schema's purpose and usage
Consider using type aliases or enums for status and transaction type fields
